Outcome.Other_Evidence:
We last inspected this service under the previous regulatory system on 20th April 2010, when we found that the National Minimum Standards which are linked to this outcome were assessed as met and that people experienced good outcomes.
The provider declared the service was compliant with this standard in their transitional application for registration under the Health and Social Care Act 2008 for this outcome area.
